attributes.action: Ban Supermarket delivery charges during a global pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Traveling for food shopping is permitted during a global pandemic which makes supermarkets areas of mass gathering, therefore the risk needs reduced. Banning supermarket delivery charges during a global pandemic assists leveling up for financially disadvantaged as well as minimises exposure risk. Supermarkets are densely packed with huge profits and are well placed to do more during a global pandemic.
attributes.background: Those on the breadline are significantly more disadvantaged. Banning Supermarket delivery charges during a Global pandemic should be enforced. Supermarkets are densely packed Nationally with huge profits, therefore are well situated to assist the Global effort in promoting reduced exposure risk.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual companies, not the UK Government or Parliament.
